page.title: 04THEOBALDS COLLEGE, ENFIELD
page.content: Theobalds College Enfield Theobalds College was owned by the Meux family.It is 222 years old this year.It has 42 bedrooms and 107 people can stay there at the same time.The Secretary showed us the kitchen ,the bedrooms,the dining room and all the corridors with all the pictures of all the owners of the past.In the room where we bombarded the Secretary with questions ,where small wooden carvings of heads.Attched to the College is a tower of over 100 steps. There are many different courses that they run in the week and at the weekend.These courses are mainly for adults who can stay at the College while working on the courses.
